item.title: Custom rights crowns! Help!
item.dc:creator: @Fadaman Fadaman
item.description:
@Fadaman wrote:

I need help with custom rights crown. So in the client.java (server sided) i made a Head Admin and Co-owner rights. They look like this

if (playerRights == 1) { titles = "@whi@[Moderator]-"; } if (playerRights == 2) { titles = "@red@[Admin]-"; } if (playerRights == 3) { titles = "@yel@[Owner]- "; } if (playerRights == 4) { titles = "@red@[HeadAdmin]-"; } if (playerRights == 5) { titles = "@yel@[Co-Owner]- "; } if (donator == 1 && playerRights == 0) { titles = "@blu@[Donator]-"; } if (donator == 1 && playerRights == 1) { titles = "@whi@[Mod/Donator]-"; } if (donator == 1 && playerRights == 2) { titles = "@red@[Admin/Donator]-"; } if (donator == 1 && playerRights == 3) { titles = "@yel@[Owner/Donator]-"; } if (donator == 2 && playerRights == 2) { titles = "@blu@[Super Donator]-@gre@ "; } if (donator == 2 && playerRights == 1) { titles = "@whi@[Mod/Super Donator]- "; } if (donator == 2 && playerRights == 2) { titles = "@red@[Admin/Super Donator]- "; } if (donator == 2 && playerRights == 3) { titles = "@blu@[Owner]-@gre@ "; } yell(titles + "" + playerName + ": " + command.substring(5));

I just wanna make a crown for HeadAdmin and Co-owner please help!! where do i go to set that!

Read full topic
